titles.title: To amend the Japan-United States Friendship Act to broaden investment authority and to strengthen criteria for membership on the Japan-United States Friendship Commission.

bill.summary: 6/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the Japan-United States Friendship Act to set forth requirements for the members of the United States Panel of the Joint Committee on United States-Japan Cultural and Educational Cooperation. Requires certain investment duties of the Secretary of the Treasury involving the Fund to be taken at the direction of the Chairman of the Japan-United States Friendship Commission. Permits investments only in instruments of public debt with maturities suitable to the Fund's needs (currently, in interest-bearing obligations of or guaranteed by the United States).
